seniority_level.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer' with 5-8+ years experience requirement, aligning with senior level in data engineering hierarchy

job_family.evidence: Job title is 'Data Engineer' and responsibilities focus on building data pipelines, Spark, and cloud data platforms

sub_specialty.evidence: Explicitly mentions 'Experience in developing streaming pipelines' and lists Kafka as part of AWS ecosystem

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management, team leadership, or mentoring responsibilities; focus is on technical implementation

primary_cloud.evidence: Job title includes 'AWS', and responsibilities mention AWS Cloud Data Platform, AWS EMR, AWS Glue, AWS RedShift, and DynamoDB

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud platforms (Azure, GCP) mentioned in requirements or responsibilities

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both 'streaming pipelines' and batch processing via Spark on Hadoop/AWS, indicating hybrid processing needs

orchestrator_category.evidence: AWS Glue and EMR are cloud-native orchestration tools; no mention of Airflow, Dagster, or dbt

storage_layer.evidence: Mentions HDFS (lake), AWS S3 (lake), and AWS RedShift (warehouse), indicating mixed storage architecture

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with onsite work model, implying regional restriction

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India (Pune) with onsite requirement, indicating country-specific timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Pune, India implies candidate must relocate or already be based there

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship; location is India, not US, making H1B irrelevant

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location in India and no mention of student visa support; OPT/CPT are US-specific

citizenship_required.evidence: Location in India implies local work authorization required; no citizenship restrictions mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position at IBM, implying W2 employment status

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits listed in job posting or extracted data

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit career tracks mentioned; only general reference to 'delivering innovation' without growth paths

mentorship_signals.evidence: Working in IBM Consulting Client Innovation Centers implies collaboration with experienced teams, though no formal mentorship program mentioned

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression in job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, architect) mentioned in job posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: All skills listed as must-haves with no nice-to-haves; strict experience requirements (5-8+ years)

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on data engineering with specific technologies (Spark, AWS, streaming) and clear responsibilities

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (Spark, AWS, streaming) are reasonable for senior data engineer with 5-8 years experience
